Elaborated terms of service of this site:
Terms of service that are legally binding can be found in the link below.
Points that are worth mentioning are that you can only upload an image if you took it yourself, upload locations only on self-knowledge, GPS info or satellite imagery that are allowed in OpenStreetMap. 
The description of the points should be original text created by you.
All uploaded material will become publicly available.

Installation instructions for Locus on d: • Surf to this site from your mobile device and follow the instructions
Installation instructions for Locus on m:
• Click "Start Download"
  • Wait for the download to complete
  • Go to "Maps", select "Offline", and then choose the map you downloaded
Installation instructions for OruxMaps o:
• Surf to this site from your mobile device and follow the instructions
    - OR -
  • Click on 'Start Download' and wait for the zip file to finish downloading.
  • Connect the Android device to your PC.
  • If needed, change your Android device USB connection mode from 'USB for charging' to 'File transfers'.
  • On your PC:
    • Open the downloaded zip file and copy the directory it contains to a temporary location, such as your Desktop.
    • Move this directory into the 'Oruxmaps/mapfiles' directory of the connected Android device.
  • Open OruxMaps and refresh the offline maps by:
    Maps → Switch map → OFFLINE → Refresh (the counter-clockwise arrows)

• Click "Start Download"
  • Wait for the download to complete
  • Go to "Maps", select "Switch map", and then "Offline"
    • Click "Refresh" (the counter-clockwise arrows)
    • Choose the map you downloaded
    • The free space required is twice the size of the downloaded map.

Report an issue instructions:
Please describe the problem as best as you can.

1. What happened?

2. When did it happen?
If the problem happened more than 72 hours ago, we would appreciate a report the next time it happens.

3. What did you do right before it happened?

4. Is this the first time it happened?

5. How can we reproduce the problem?
